author: EXM7777
text:
if you find yourself in a situation you've never managed before, do this:

create an AI clone of yourself for decision-making in unfamiliar territory, here's how it works:

load a project with:
> game theory principles
> business strategy frameworks
> your personal context
> your communication style

then build a system prompt optimized for intelligent choices

and suddenly you've got a version of yourself that can think through complex decisions you've never faced before

i'm using this right now to exit an agency (first time doing this)

it won't save your ass from every mistake... but it'll keep you from making the obviously stupid ones
